name: Custom-brawl
tagline: An Open Source Fighting game on Android
body:
Welcome to the Custom-Brawl lair.

![Screenshot of Custom Brawl](https://lh3.ggpht.com/b0uV1zliOYYW0SkoLAN9x1t7Ksyioqp05uLW_de3wa7lvgSZgRe3t9cBnSNL2Qfing=h310-rw)

This game about maximum customisability and is available on android here: [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=softtoasty.custombrawl](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=softtoasty.custombrawl)

It is a 2d fighting game made for the modder! Users can store their created characters onto the sd card and load them onto the game.

## Any help is welcome!
* Custom coders for game engine
* Artwork and sound design
* Game design
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
